cards.mainText: There is a merchant offering you food for a price
cards.followUpText1: You bought some food from the merchant
cards.followUpText2: You decided you do not need food right now

cards.mainText: A thief is ambushing you, wanting 15 coins
cards.followUpText2: You tried to fight back but failed

cards.mainText: On the streets you see an old lady trying to carry several bags of apples
cards.followUpText1: You helped the old lady carrying the apples home. As a thanks she gave you a bag to keep
cards.followUpText2: You ignored the struggles of the old lady and strode onwards

cards.mainText: There is an inn in the distance
cards.followUpText1: You bought yourself a room and got some rest
cards.followUpText2: You walked onwards, dismissing a safe place to rest

cards.mainText: A shady figure approaches you."I have what you seek, a quest to lead you to your destiny! But only if you are willing to pay"
cards.followUpText1: You gave him some money and in return he gave you a red crystal
cards.followUpText2: "A mistake! Without guidance you will wander until you die!"

cards.mainText: Three Children are playing with each other. As they notice you one of them runs towards you. "Hey! Do a trick!"
cards.followUpText1: They give you some apples to juggle with and you try your best. They walk away unimpressed.
You drank from the fountain and felt your stomach hurting shortly after
cards.followUpText2: You threw a coin in the fountain for good luck

cards.mainText: In front of you lies a bag with a name tag
cards.decisionText1: Take the contents of the bag for yourself
cards.decisionText2: Take the bag with you for the owner
cards.followUpText1: You opened the bag and found food, water, bandages and some money
cards.followUpText2: You took the bag with you in hopes of finding the rightful owner

cards.mainText: You walk past a man down on his luck, claiming he lost all his stuff
cards.decisionText1: Give him the bag you have found
cards.followUpText1: "You found my stuff? I cannot thank you enough! Here, take some of it for yourself"
cards.followUpText2: You walk past the man who is probably the owner of the bag you found earlier. Thinking that you may never find the owner you decided to take the contents for yourself

cards.mainText: You see a house with a familiar name
cards.followUpText1: A familiar face opens the door. The man whose bag you found invites you out of gratitude in to stay the night. You feel well rested
cards.followUpText2: As soon as you walk past the house a familiar face slams open the door. The man whose bag you found invites you out of gratitude in to stay the night. You feel well rested

cards.mainText: You see a tree with apples on it
cards.decisionText1: Pick up the apples from the ground
cards.followUpText1: You took the apples from the ground, you feel a slight pain in your stomach
cards.followUpText2: You kicked the tree and took the fresh apples from the ground

cards.mainText: While walking along the street a medical clinic catches your eye
cards.followUpText1: You went inside the clinic and let got a checkup. You feel better
cards.followUpText2: You did not go inside the clinic

cards.mainText: In the middle of the market you see a man looking for people willing to do day labor
cards.followUpText1: You did some manual labor to earn yourself some money
cards.followUpText2: You ignored your opportunity for some quick cash

cards.mainText: A devote believer in red robes approaches you, wanting to talk about their deity
cards.followUpText1: "Greetings, fellow human! Are you interested in becoming a true believer?" He gives you a pamphlet from the Mutan Order
cards.followUpText2: You ignore what they have to say

cards.mainText: A devote believer in green robes approaches you, wanting to talk about their deity
cards.followUpText1: " Greetings! Feeling down on your luck? Become part of the Fortuna Order and feel as lucky as never before!" He gives you a pamphlet from the Fortuna Order
cards.followUpText2: You ignore what they have to say

cards.mainText: On your left you see a church of the Mutan Order
cards.followUpText1: You joined the Mutan Order. You feel ... weird
cards.followUpText2: You ignored your chance to join the Mutan Order

cards.mainText: An agonizing pain overwhelms your entire body, feeling like your body turns inside out. You collapse on the ground
cards.followUpText1: When you wake up you find yourself looking different and being stronger than before. You feel like you aren't quite yourself anymore
cards.followUpText2: When you wake up you find yourself looking different and being stronger than before. You feel like you aren't quite yourself anymore

cards.mainText: On your left you see a church of the Fortuna Order
cards.followUpText1: You joined the Fortuna Order. You somehow feel luckier than before
cards.followUpText2: You ignored your chance to join the Fortuna Order
